titles: A dialogue betwixt Tom and Dick the former a country-man, the other a citizen. Presented to his Excellency and the Council of State, at Drapers-Hall in London, March 28. 1660. (To the tune of I'le never love thee more.)
author: Jordan, Thomas, 1612?-1685?, attributed name.
notes: Verse - "Now would I give my life to see".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
